meanings: stone, rock, (조약돌) pebble, (아주 작은 돌 조각) grit
(아이가 태어난 지 1년 되는 날) dol, first birthday

vlive.korean: 미친 건 너야 돌부처야! You are the one who is crazy! 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 그날 밤 일 죽어도 얘기 안하려고...[넘버식스]ep7.
vlive.english: You are the one who is crazy!

vlive.korean: 돌 기념 머리띠인 걸로 알고 있거든요? I heard this is a headband for when you turn one year old. 듣기 View video ITZY : 깜짝리아브이 기다렸찌~?✌️
vlive.english: I heard this is a headband for when you turn one year old.

vlive.korean: 최대한 순화해서 이제 돌+아이로... So, I purified my language as much as I could, I just called him "crazy". 듣기 View video iKON : 2월8일은 무슨날?
vlive.english: So, I purified my language as much as I could, I just called him "crazy".

vlive.korean: [돌잡이 이벤트와 함께 케이크도 먹고(?)] 어때요? 맛있어요? [They do a birthday event and eat some cake(?)] How is it? Is it good? 듣기 View video 이한결, 남도현 : [비하인드] 이한결, 남도현 1st Fanmeeting : HAPPY DAY
vlive.english: [They do a birthday event and eat some cake(?)] How is it? Is it good?

vlive.korean: [흰색은 빛을 반사하기 때문에 같은 크기로 제작하면 흰 돌이 조금 더 커 보이는] 오케이! [while white reflects light. So, if the two are made the same size, white stones end up] Okay! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.6
vlive.english: [while white reflects light. So, if the two are made the same size, white stones end up] Okay!

examples.korean: The stone struck her on the forehead. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 돌이 그녀의 이마에 맞았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She carves in both stone and wood. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 돌 조각도 하고 나무 조각도 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She carves in both stone and wood. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She weighed the stone in her hand. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그 돌을 손에 들고 무게를 가늠해 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She weighed the stone in her hand. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She stared stonily at him for a minute. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그를 잠시 돌처럼 차갑게 응시했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She stared stonily at him for a minute. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They had been turned to stone by an enchantment. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 마법에 걸려 돌이 되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They had been turned to stone by an enchantment. Add to Wordbook
